chapter.text: ya-seen
wal-qur'ani l-hakimi
innaka lamina l-mur'salina
ʿala siratin mus'taqimin
tanzila l-ʿazizi l-rahimi
litundhira qawman ma undhira abauhum fahum ghafiluna
laqad haqqa l-qawlu ʿala aktharihim fahum la yu'minuna
inna jaʿalna fi aʿnaqihim aghlalan fahiya ila l-adhqani fahum muq'mahuna
wajaʿalna min bayni aydihim saddan wamin khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fahum la yub'siruna
wasawaon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum la yu'minuna
innama tundhiru mani ittabaʿa l-dhik'ra wakhashiya l-rahmana bil-ghaybi fabashir'hu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karimin
inna nahnu nuh'yi l-mawta wanaktubu ma qaddamu waatharahum wakulla shayin ahsaynahu fi imamin mubinin
wa-id'rib lahum mathalan ashaba l-qaryati idh jaaha l-mur'saluna
idh arsalna ilayhimu ith'nayni fakadhabuhuma faʿazzazna bithalithin faqalu inna ilaykum mur'saluna
qalu ma antum illa basharun mith'luna wama anzala l-rahmanu min shayin in antum illa takdhibuna
qalu rabbuna yaʿlamu inna ilaykum lamur'saluna
wama ʿalayna illa l-balaghu l-mubinu
qalu inna tatayyarna bikum la-in lam tantahu lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minna ʿadhabun alimun
qalu tairukum maʿakum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
wajaa min aqsa l-madinati rajulun yasʿa qala yaqawmi ittabiʿu l-mur'salina
ittabiʿu man la yasalukum ajran wahum muh'taduna
wama liya la aʿbudu alladhi fatarani wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿuna
a-attakhidhu min dunihi alihatan in yurid'ni l-rahmanu bidurrin la tugh'ni ʿanni shafaʿatuhum shayan wala yunqidhuni
inni idhan lafi dalalin mubinin
inni amantu birabbikum fa-is'maʿuni
qila ud'khuli l-janata qala yalayta qawmi yaʿlamuna
bima ghafara li rabbi wajaʿalani mina l-muk'ramina
wama anzalna ʿala qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina l-samai wama kunna munzilina
in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum khamiduna
yahasratan ʿala l-ʿibadi ma yatihim min rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina l-quruni annahum ilayhim la yarjiʿuna
wa-in kullun lamma jamiʿun ladayna muh'daruna
waayatun lahumu l-ardu l-maytatu ahyaynaha wa-akhrajna min'ha habban famin'hu yakuluna
wajaʿalna fiha jannatin min nakhilin wa-aʿnabin wafajjarna fiha mina l-ʿuyuni
liyakulu min thamarihi wama ʿamilathu aydihim afala yashkuruna
sub'hana alladhi khalaqa l-azwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu l-ardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la yaʿlamuna
waayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu l-nahara fa-idha hum muz'limuna
wal-shamsu tajri limus'taqarrin laha dhalika taqdiru l-ʿazizi l-ʿalimi
wal-qamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta ʿada kal-ʿur'juni l-qadimi
la l-shamsu yanbaghi laha an tud'rika l-qamara wala al-laylu sabiqu l-nahari wakullun fi falakin yasbahuna
waayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi l-ful'ki l-mashhuni
wakhalaqna lahum min mith'lihi ma yarkabuna
wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum fala sarikha lahum wala hum yunqadhuna
illa rahmatan minna wamataʿan ila hinin
wa-idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wama khalfakum laʿallakum tur'hamuna
wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu ʿanha muʿ'ridina
wa-idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu l-lahu qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu anut'ʿimu man law yashau l-lahu atʿamahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubinin
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhissimuna
fala yastatiʿuna tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarjiʿuna
wanufikha fi l-suri fa-idha hum mina l-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiluna
qalu yawaylana man baʿathana min marqadina hadha ma waʿada l-rahmanu wasadaqa l-mur'saluna
in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jamiʿun ladayna muh'daruna
fal-yawma la tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wala tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum taʿmaluna
inna ashaba l-janati l-yawma fi shughulin fakihuna
hum wa-azwajuhum fi zilalin ʿala l-araiki muttakiuna
lahum fiha fakihatun walahum ma yaddaʿuna
salamun qawlan min rabbin rahimin
wa-im'tazu l-yawma ayyuha l-muj'rimuna
alam aʿhad ilaykum yabani adama an la taʿbudu l-shaytana innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubinun
wa-ani uʿ'buduni hadha siratun mus'taqimun
walaqad adalla minkum jibillan kathiran afalam takunu taʿqiluna
hadhihi jahannamu allati kuntum tuʿaduna
is'lawha l-yawma bima kuntum takfuruna
al-yawma nakhtimu ʿala afwahihim watukallimuna aydihim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanu yaksibuna
walaw nashau latamasna ʿala aʿyunihim fa-is'tabaqu l-sirata fa-anna yub'siruna
walaw nashau lamasakhnahum ʿala makanatihim fama is'tataʿu mudiyyan wala yarjiʿuna
waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fi l-khalqi afala yaʿqiluna
wama ʿallamnahu l-shiʿ'ra wama yanbaghi lahu in huwa illa dhik'run waqur'anun mubinun
liyundhira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa l-qawlu ʿala l-kafirina
awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma ʿamilat aydina anʿaman fahum laha malikuna
wadhallalnaha lahum famin'ha rakubuhum wamin'ha yakuluna
walahum fiha manafiʿu wamasharibu afala yashkuruna
wa-ittakhadhu min duni l-lahi alihatan laʿallahum yunsaruna
la yastatiʿuna nasrahum wahum lahum jundun muh'daruna
fala yahzunka qawluhum inna naʿlamu ma yusirruna wama yuʿ'linuna
awalam yara l-insanu anna khalaqnahu min nut'fatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubinun
wadaraba lana mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qala man yuh'yi l-ʿizama wahiya ramimun
qul yuh'yiha alladhi ansha-aha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin ʿalimun
alladhi jaʿala lakum mina l-shajari l-akhdari naran fa-idha antum min'hu tuqiduna
awalaysa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda biqadirin ʿala an yakhluqa mith'lahum bala wahuwa l-khalaqu l-ʿalimu
innama amruhu idha arada shayan an yaqula lahu kun fayakunu
fasub'hana alladhi biyadihi malakutu kulli shayin wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿuna
